casebody.data:
G. B. G. CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. McCRORY STORES CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 172. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 9, 1939. Morris Iiirsch, of New York City, for appellant. George L. Wheelock, of New York City, (Max W. Zabel and Greek Wells, both of Chicago, 111., of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L, HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
